meanings.definition: Schoolwork assigned to be done outside of class.
meanings.sent1: My teacher gives us a lot of homework to do after school.
meanings.sent2: I have math homework tonight that I need to finish.
meanings.sent3: I forgot my homework at home, so I had to rush back to get it.
meanings.sent4: Completing my homework feels like climbing a mountain of tasks.
meanings.sent5: The pile of homework on my desk seemed to grow taller every day.

meanings.definition: A task or assignment to be completed at home.
meanings.sent1: My mom helps me with my homework when I find it difficult.
meanings.sent2: Finishing my homework early allows me to relax for the rest of the evening.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled juice on my homework, so I had to redo it.
meanings.sent4: The homework felt like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The satisfaction of completing my homework on time is rewarding.

meanings.definition: Work or study done at home in preparation for a lesson or class.
meanings.sent1: I always do my homework before going to bed to start the day fresh.
meanings.sent2: Homework helps me review what I learned in class that day.
meanings.sent3: My dog ate my homework, and I had to explain it to my teacher.
meanings.sent4: Homework is like planting seeds of knowledge in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The quiet of my room helps me focus on my homework without distractions.
